column1: How can adding Music be useful for my business?
column2: Adding Music on your business will enable you create and share multiple Playlists on your business. An attractive music player provides great experience to visitors of your business. This is a great tool to showcase your talent and work on your business.

column1: How can I add Music to my business?
column2:
You can add Music to your business in one of the following ways:
1. To add a music playlist, please follow the steps below:
a. Go to the business Profile.
b. Click “Music” tab on the business Profile. You might have to click on the “More” tab to expand the menu bar to see “Music”.
c. Click on “Upload Music” link from the top left corner of the “Music” tab to add music.
d. Fill up the form to add music. To make your business music playlist attractive, upload a suitable image for your “Playlist Artwork”.
e. Click on “Add Music” to upload music for your business.
f. Click on “Save Music to Playlist”, to save Playlist for your business.
 
2. From the “Apps” section of your business Dashboard, click on the “Upload Music” button and follow the steps from ‘d’ to ‘f’ as in case 1 above.

column1: How many songs can I upload in a Playlist on my business?
column2: There is no limit to the number of songs that you can upload in a Playlist on your business. You can upload any number of songs on your business.

column1: How many Playlists can I create?
column2: There is no limit on the number of Playlists that you can create for your business. You can create any number of Playlists for your business.
Yes, you can rename your Playlists by using the “Edit Playlist” option for them.

column1: What is the purpose of “Play on business Profile”?
column2: Amongst the music playlists for your business, you might want to highlight one of them. This could be because that playlist might be a recent release, your most admired tracks, etc. The music playlist of your business for which you select the “Play on business Profile” option, will be prominently displayed on your business Profile in a block. This also makes your business more attractive.

column1: I want to search for a specific business Music playlist. How can I do that?
column2: You can search for a business Music playlist by using the detailed search box available in the “Music” section under business navigation.

column1: Who all can create Music on my business?
column2: You can choose who all can create Music for your business while creating your business, by choosing the appropriate option for the “Music Creation Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit business Details” link for your business.

column1: What are Sponsored business Playlists? How can Playlists created on my business be made Sponsored?
column2:
Sponsored business Playlists are those Playlists which have been created for Paid businesses. These Sponsored Playlists will appear in the “Sponsored Playlists” block in the “Playlists” section under business navigation. On “Browse Playlists” for business Playlists and in search results, they are marked with a “Sponsored” marker. The search form for business Playlists also has a quick filter for seeing Sponsored Playlists.
If your business is created under a Paid Package, then the Playlists created for it would automatically be made Sponsored. The availability of Paid business Packages on our site is conditional depending on the settings configured by our site administrators.

column1: What are Featured business Music Playlists? Who can mark Music Playlists for businesses as Featured?
column2:
Featured business Music Playlists are music playlists of businesses which are specially marked as “Featured”. Such playlists are more highlighted than others and thus gain more visibility. Featured business Music appear in the “Featured Playlists” slideshow in the “Music” section under business navigation. On “Browse Music” for business Music and in search results, they are marked with a “Featured” marker. The search form for business Music also has a quick filter for seeing Featured Music.
business Music can be made Featured only by our site administrators.

column1: I have a business on this site. However, the Music feature is not available for my business. What could be the reason?
column2:
The reason why Music feature is not available for your business could be that, you might have chosen a Package for your business for which the Music App is not available. In this case, you can see if choosing a different Package with the Music App suits you. You can change the Package for your business from the “Packages” section of your business Dashboard.
Availability of Packages for businesses, and their features are conditional depending on the settings chosen by our site administrator.
